page.title: 09CLUBS IN WILLINGDON
page.content: There is an Adult Education Centre at Willingdon Comprehensive which offers many varied activities and pursuits. Some of the clubs are sporting activities, such as badminton and others for learning skills such as cookery,car maintenance and upholstery. Many adults go to local associations to meet people with similar interests.They belong to groups such as the Womens Institute,Wannock Art Club and Drama Clubs. There are clubs for people with rather more specialized interests such as Bee Keepers Association,a Folk Dance Club and a Bible Study Group. Willingdon Wives meet once a fortnight on Wednesday evenings and activities are varied,including talks, demonstrations,social events, outings.
